name: Deathly Dagger
description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-7 on foe through its next action. If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foe after combat.

refinable.description: After combat, if unit attacked, deals 10 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target and inflicts Def/Res-7 through their next actions.
